title: MC_ReadCoordinateTransform (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_ReadCoordinateTransform
This function block reads the coordinate transformation that is configured
between the world coordinate system (WCS) and a product coordinate system
(PCS_1, PCS_2) or machine coordinate system (MCS).
If a dynamic coordinate system is queried, its current value is returned.
Note
The returned coordiante system is not necessarily the same
that is used by the active movement.  Instead, the returned coordinate
system is the one that is effective for new movements.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Gets the coordinate transformation of the
axis group continuously while enabled

rows:
Which coordinate transformation is to be read.  Allowed values are
PCS_1, PCS_2, and MCS.
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
The name of the coordinate system.
